name: The Equestrian Domaine
description:
DESCRIPTION
Located in the heart of a historic village, just one hour from Paris, this Domaine has survived the centuries while preserving its magnificent architectural heritage. The wider estate boasts impressive equestrian facilities.
Following several phases of renovation, this building built in the 12th century is now equipped with modern facilities to accommodate you and your guests for your wedding day.
The old carriage barn, with its exposed framework, has been converted into a reception room which is perfect for your wedding breakfast.
Located in the main wing, the guest house can accommodate up to 14 people in optimal comfort conditions.
The Main Hall:
This fully modular space has been designed to accommodate your weddings and private receptions of all kinds. All this in the unique setting of an historic estate in the Yvelines. Restored and fitted out by an architect designer, this former barn seduces by the mixture of materials and shapes (staircase, exclusive furniture, direct and indirect lighting), mixing tradition and modernity.
Open to both the courtyard of the estate and the outdoor pergola fitted out with a structure from the Eiffel workshops, this Salle is equipped with all current communication elements and also offers a professional catering area.
The interior courtyard of the Estate, with a surface area of 5,600 m2, offers many spaces for organizing receptions, secular ceremonies or even for taking your best photos during your wedding.
The Domaine can also be decorated according to your wishes to host secular ceremonies, musical receptions, or other private receptions.
The wider estate:
The farm buildings have been transformed into a professional equestrian facility with 10 boxes, a large saddlery and two treatment rooms.
There is a beautiful historic church in the village which is within walking distance.
Accommodation:
Located in the main wing of the estate, the Maison and its 450 m2 can accommodate 15 people on site during your weddings, receptions or seminars. Its double East / West exposure offers you an open view on all the areas of the Domaine.
Completely renovated, the Maison offers all the comforts of a modern house, with its 100 m2 living room and games room including a bar, table football, billiards, etc. The terrace and the play areas (pétanque court, table tennis) will also allow you to enjoy the outdoors of the Domaine with family or friends.
Pricing:
Exclusivity of the domain from Friday 4 p.m. to Sunday 4 p.m.
€ 8,850
Reception room (200 pers.)
Terraces & Pergola
Tables & chairs (150 pers.)
Sound & Big screen
Park for access to the church
Guest house (2 nights / 15 pers.)
Housekeeping & linens
For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than willing to help.
